price: Hani Rabbin meleklere; “Gerçekten ben çamurdan bir beşer yaratacağım.” demişti.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّي خَٰلِقُۢ بَشَرٗا مِّن طِينٖ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla rabbuka lil'malāikati innī khāliqun basharan min ṭīnin
